name: 阿羅漢 ARAKAN
description:
A dungeon crawler for dungeon crawler game jam 3.

ARAKAN (阿羅漢) is a game about being able to control your body and mind during combat.

Situated in the Edo Pediod in Japan, your main objective as a bounty hunter is to invade the Hanamatsu-jyō, a castle between a large forest with soldiers guarding it, in order to kill the Shogun of Hanamatsu. 

Code, Art by Thiago Yasue

Sound and Music by Roger Norio

Special Thanks - Natieto and Pim3nta
